org.ambraproject.wombat.service

Interface AssetService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AssetServiceImpl

    public interface AssetService
    Service that deals with static assets, such as javascript and CSS. Contains functionality for concatenating and minifying (aka "compiling") these assets, as well as serving them.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  AssetService.AssetType
      Represents the types of asset files processed by this service.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String COMPILED_PATH_PREFIX
      The logical (servlet-relative) directory in which compiled asset files are served from.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getCompiledAssetLink(AssetService.AssetType assetType, List<String> filenames, Site site, String cacheKey)
      Concatenates a group of assets, compiles them, and returns the path where the compiled file is served.
      long getLastModifiedTime(String assetFilename)
      Returns the mtime of the given asset file.
      void serveCompiledAsset(String assetFilename, OutputStream outputStream)
      Writes an asset that was previously compiled with a call to getCompiledCssLink to the stream.

    • Field Detail

      • COMPILED_PATH_PREFIX

        static final String COMPILED_PATH_PREFIX
        The logical (servlet-relative) directory in which compiled asset files are served from.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getCompiledAssetLink

        String getCompiledAssetLink(AssetService.AssetType assetType,
                          List<String> filenames,
                          Site site,
                          String cacheKey)
                            throws IOException
        Concatenates a group of assets, compiles them, and returns the path where the compiled file is served. The compiled filename and the contents of the compiled file will be cached.
        Parameters:
        assetType - specifies whether the asset is javascript or CSS
        filenames - list of servlet paths that correspond to asset files to compile
        site - the journal/site
        cacheKey - key that will be used to cache the results
        Returns:
        servlet path to the single, compiled asset file
        Throws:
        IOException

      • serveCompiledAsset

        void serveCompiledAsset(String assetFilename,
                      OutputStream outputStream)
                        throws IOException
        Writes an asset that was previously compiled with a call to getCompiledCssLink to the stream.
        Parameters:
        assetFilename - the filename, as returned by getCompiledAssetLink
        outputStream - output; this method will close the stream as well
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getLastModifiedTime

        long getLastModifiedTime(String assetFilename)
        Returns the mtime of the given asset file.
        Parameters:
        assetFilename - the filename, as returned by getCompiledAssetLink
        Returns:
        last modified time of the given asset file
